resources.string: Download Pro Version at just \ \ $0.99 \ \ to Unlock all features.\n Give it a try, it\'s Worth.

If Notifications are not showing at sometime, Click on the ON Button and re-enable Notification access to Screenfly. If it doesn\'t work please Re-boot your device. Release your breath its just a System Bug.
Disable this if you Cannot Disable System Notifications from LockScreen
If you are on Lollipop or Above and there is no Option to turn System Heads-up of, then Enable this.
Tap the button below to enable or disable Screenfly notifications.

Are you using MIUI or a similar ROM? Before you can use this app, you'll probably need to give it some slack when it comes to security.
\( 1. Go to System Settings > All > Apps > Downloaded > Screenfly notifications.
 2. Toggle the switch that says 'Show popup windows' (second option).
 3. At the bottom, go to 'Manage permissions'.
 4. Set 'I trust this app' to on. \)

 OR Click on below Button and Directly Enable.
Like what you see? Check out my other apps as well:
Filter notifications based on their priority.\nRequires Android 4.1
Uncheck an app to mute it. You can also tap and hold on the X button in the Screenfly to mute an app.
Check an app to keep Screenfly from interfering while you\'re using it. Does not work on some Android 5+ devices.
Display the Screenfly on the lockscreen.
QuickLyric has trouble reading your music - consider rebooting your device
If the app has been misbehaving lately, tap here to report the problem. You don\'t have to do anything if the app is behaving normally.\n\n

string-array.name: priorityLevel
string-array.item: Critical and urgent (missed calls, directions, emergency alerts)
Contextual and background info (weather, expired events, suggestions)

resources.string: Turn the screen on when you get a notification
Click here to Customize your Theme Color.
Keep notifications on the lockscreen until you dismiss them
Use L\'s round icons instead of the squared icons from earlier releases
Don\'t turn the screen on if the phone is in a pocket or facedown on a table.
Don\'t display Screenfly for notifications from the current app.\nThis does NOT work in Android 6.0+ due to a system restriction.
Display song metadata on track change.\nNote: not all music players are supported.
Both the notification listener and the accessibility service is enabled. Please disable one of them.
Select \'Screenfly notifications\' to toggle the service
Tap the icon to open the notification as a floating window. Experimental feature, works with OmniRom and XHaloFloatingWindow.
Hide the dismiss button from the notifications
Only display the first line of the notification.
Fine-tune the Icon size in the popups
Fine-tune the Font size in the popups
Enable to Set Screenfly to Default Color. ( If you Accidently changed the Color )
Sorry! Your device doesn\'t support speech input

This will allow only a single pop-up on screen, thus Screenfly will not take your entire screen, rather notifications will come on top of previous one.(In LockScreen Screenfly will display all notifications from middle of your Screen.)
Only display popups on the lockscreen.
Don\'t display message contents on the lockscreen

Enable this service to allow Screenfly to read your notifications.\n\nDO NOT enable the accessibility service if your device is running Android 4.3 or newer (follow instructions inside the app instead).
After disabling this service, some features in Screenfly might not work properly.
No proximity sensor detected. Pocket detection will not work. Please DON\'T report this bug.
After turning the screen on, keep it on as long as the Screenfly is visible.

Enabling this will allow Screenfly to turn off your screen.

Only turn this on if the screen doesn't turn off after displaying popups on the lockscreen.

If you continue, you will not be able to uninstall Screenfly until you turn this off.
You didn\'t read that, did you?
Device provisioning is not enabled. Stopping.
The service is enabled. Try sending yourself a message.\nIf it doesn\'t work, please reboot your device and try again.\nTap here if you need help
The service is running. Try sending yourself a message.\nTap here if you need help.
%s might be blocking Screenfly from accessing your notifications. Please disable it from the accessibility menu.
Remove the popup when you touch outside the Screenfly

If you swipe the Screenfly upwards, Screenfly will re-display it after the number of minutes you specify here. Set to zero to disable.\nWARNING: Experimental, unstable feature. Don\'t rely on it to work.
Warning: Google removed the ability to get running tasks in Android 6.0, so this will not work properly.
Remove notifications from the drawer when you swipe them away horizontally. You can still tap the X to dismiss from the drawer.\nRequires Android 4.3
Attempt to unlock the device when you open a notification. Disable if you get a blank desktop when opening a notification.
Give my other apps access to your notifications. This will reduce RAM usage if you use an app like Voiceify. Keep it off unless one of my apps ask you to enable it.
This will give %s access to your notifications. Are you sure this is what you want?
Show ongoing, non-clearable notifications displayed by background services like Downloads.\nNote: If some notifications refuse to go away, try disabling this.
If the normal unlock option doesn\'t work, try enabling this.\nWARNING: This will override all lockscreen security, and it can cause problems on some devices!

Thanks for downloading Screenfly.\n\nDuring setup, you\'ll see a few warnings from the Android system. They seem a bit scary, but don\'t worry; Screenfly does NOT collect, store or send your data anywhere.
Give Screenfly access to your notifications by tapping the button below, turning on Screenfly, and then pressing the back button on your device.
To allow Screenfly to view popups, tap the button below, set the swtich to on, and press the back button on your device.

If you see a Screenfly notification at the top of your screen, you're ready to go!

Now, go to the settings page and tweak everything just the way you want it.
Thanks for trying Screenfly! If you like it, please leave a review on Play. To access all features download the Pro Version.
Enabling this will make Screenfly consider the screen locked whenever it is turned off. Useful if you get notifications on the lock screen even if you have this setting turned off.
